record.description: John Hope Franklin (left) and John T. Wilson (center). [John Hope Franklin (John Matthews Manly Distinguished Service Professor in the department of History, University of Chicago) delivered the Jefferson Lecture in the Humanities for 1976, "Racial Equality in America."]
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Contact print and negative on file Series III Jefferson Lectures Franklin : Contact Prints and Negatives, barcode # 47869734.
